channel.title: Logging in with Bluurs.Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
channel.description:
I seem to be having trouble logging in I log in for about half a second then log out. I'm not sure if this is client or server sided so I posted in both places. Please help if you can or correct me if I am asking for help in the wrong place. Thanks. I get this error. [code]Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection[/code]
BTW: This is the link to client. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428873.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428873.0.html[/url]

item.title: Logging in with Bluurs.Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

its the way bluurrs client is setup,

first go into player.java and declare these ints

public int skulls = 0;
public int hint = 0;

after that search for

protected void appendPlayerAppearance(stream str) {

and then look down a little and you should see some playerprops variables.
make them look like this

playerProps.writeByte(skulls);
playerProps.writeByte(hint);
playerProps.writeByte(headIcon);

save, compile, run.

that should let you login to your server with bluurrs

Read full topic
item.source: Logging in with Bluurs.Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
